definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: My boss is wearing his gray tie so today must be a Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 老闆今天打灰領帶，今天一定是星期二。

sentences.english: The blue shirt and gray tie are a good .
sentences.chinese: 藍襯衫和灰領帶很相配。

sentences.english: The blue shirt and gray tie are a good match .
sentences.chinese: 藍襯衫與灰領帶很諧調。
